desc: A eclectic, trendy women's boutique specializing in creating a look for your lifestyle. We are a full service boutique and carry casual to dressy clothing, gifts and accessories for women of all ages. Brands we carry :Spanx, Veronica M, Hobo, Free People, Ada belts, Z-supply, Sanctuary, Level 99, Kerisma ,and Blank NYC

layout.text: Constantly Curating Beautiful Clothing and Accessories for the Modern Woman .
Atlanta's Premiere Boutique for the past 26 years
